fields.description: Inventory of Josefa Antonia d'Albuquerque Maranhão, 1855, who was married  to major captain José Francisco d'Albuquerque Maranhão, executor and half owner of marriage property, dweller in the Santo Amaro Engenho, in the City of Parahyba do Norte.  Description of assets: objects of gold and silver (clock, bowls, spoons, etc), livestock (vacum cattle and horses, slaves), properties: Engenho Santo Amaro, Rio do Meio ranch and farms in Bananeiras in the Province of Paraiba; Engenho Cunhaú and cattle farms in Assú and Mipibú, in the Province of Rio Grande do Norte. It contains the judge's court order (21 March 1855), sharing of assets (2 August 1856), delivery of assets (4 August 1856), justification of the couple's debt to Victorino Pereira Maia (February 1856).   Document damaged by water, it lacks initial sheets, it contains fungus, tears, faded ink. Part of the documentation is not in chronological order.
fields.title: Inventário de Josefa Antonia d’Albuquerque Maranhão - 1855
fields.institution: Arquivo do Fórum Judicial Comarca de João Pessoa
